author: COMSOL
description: This is a benchmark problem for multibody dynamics where a slider crank mechanism is studied. The links in the mechanism are rigid. Two hinge joints and a reduced slot joint are used to create the connections between the links. The time history of the acceleration at a certain point is compared with the result from the reference.
label: slider_crank_mechanism.mph
